messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] WAS:Re: quotes...now library fines
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/10/2004 8:23:17 PM Central Standard Time, ... It was only for kids, I asked, LOL!! Laura [Non-text portions of this message have been
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/10/2004 8:23:17 PM Central Standard Time,
mkirk@... writes:


> Here in Columbus, Ohio Videos and DVDs are $1.00/day!!! You have to really
> be careful to keep up on them. They do have a system to renew on-line, and
> recently added the feature of e-mail reminders when things are almost due,
> but I still somehow let things go sometimes. They recently had a program to
> let you read-off your fines; a certain amount of reading would reduce your
> debt, but I'm not sure exactly how it worked.
>

It was only for kids, I asked, LOL!!
Laura


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
